00036 
00037 /*! This class will copy Calvin data to GCOS CHP objects. */
00038 class CHPConversionUtilities
00039 {
00040 public:
00041 
00042         /*! Copies the calvin object to the GCOS object.
00043          * @param inFile The Calvin CHP file object.
00044          * @param outFile The GCOS CHP file object.
00045         */
00046         static void Copy(affymetrix_calvin_io::CHPData &inFile, affxchpwriter::CCHPFileWriter &outFile);
00047 
00048         /*! Sets the algorithm name in the CCHPFileWriter object.
00049          *      It ensures that the algorithm name value is appropriate before setting it.
00050          *      @param outFile The GCOS CHP file object.
00051          *      @param algName The algorithm name.
00052          */
00053         static void SetAlgName(affxchpwriter::CCHPFileWriter& outFile, std::string algName);
00054 
00055 };
